message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You were too generous, I'll take this offer!
Let's try again! A 45-55 split, a bit more fair this time.
You're getting desperate, I'll take the lead now!
You're pushing it, Bob! I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting close to the edge, Alice! I'll take the majority now!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're almost out of time, Alice. I'll take it all!
